item.title: Counter-Portal
item.dc:creator: Mr_Saurus
item.description:
I think I heard somewhere that valve tested a portal deathmatch, but it wasn’t very fun so they scrapped it.

It’s easy enough to kill each other in portal 2 co op though. Easy to make custom maps and portal placement never fail command help too. You can even pick up turrets and use them as guns.

Now what I feel like would be a bit more fun though, is a capture the flag, or sort of castle invasion game mode. You set up your castle, with a limited amount of currency to put down traps and puzzles to get through, and you have to get into the other person’s castle.

Read full topic

Maybe add some kind of radiation gel so that players could combat each other, since it’s kind of hard to kill other players with just repulsion, propulsion, adhesion, and environmental hazards. There could be deathmatch, capture-the-flag, you name it.
